name: 依附關係心理治療
restrict: ◎必須先修過【PCM0089  諮商理論專題研究】◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【PCM0072  諮商技術專題研究】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: The purpose of this advanced psychotherapy seminar course is to introduce students to attachment theory, relevant research findings regarding attachment influences on children’s and adults’ interpersonal and affect regulation behaviors, psychotherapy interventions/models that use attachment principles, and empirical evidence that supports the effectiveness. This course is designed for advanced graduate students in applied psychology or other mental health service fields who have acquired basic clinical experiences. A special emphasis will be placed on assisting students to further strengthen their clinical competencies by integrating attachment theory constructs/principles in their case conceptualizations and treatment implementation.
goals: Gain In-depth knowledge in attachment theory as applied to both children and adults
Acquire adequate proficiency in attachment literature
Demonstrate solid familiarity of attachment-based psychotherapy models for adults and empirical studies examining their clinical effectiveness
Enhance abilities in case conceptualizations by integrating attachment principles
Develop appropriate treatment goals/plans based on the theory
Demonstrate basic counseling/clinical competences in using attachment-based interventions

methodologies.note: Lecturing will account for about 40% of the teaching time.
Students will be assigned into small groups to discuss assigned topics and then to share the outcomes with the whole class.

The instructor will demonstrate attachment-based interventions and students will be expected to complete case studies individually in class to demonstrate their abilities of applying the acquired concepts and interventions to their clients.
AV media will be used during the lecture process throughout the semester.
The instructor will present several research projects focusing on various attachment-related topics.
